description: This file provides utility functions for managing an admin inbox stored in localStorage, including retrieving, appending, clearing, and subscribing to updates. It handles PDF data URLs and ensures resilience to parse errors and SSR environments.

methods.name: getInboxItems
methods.description: Returns a list of inbox items from localStorage, resilient to parse errors and SSR.

methods.name: appendInboxItem
methods.description: Appends a new inbox item while preserving existing data, normalizing PDF fields.

methods.name: clearInbox
methods.description: Clears the entire inbox stored in localStorage (for development).

methods.name: subscribe
methods.description: Subscribes to updates in the inbox, returning an unsubscribe function.
